Reviews.Title: “Beautiful service”
Reviews.Author: EngMavi
Reviews.Content: Very good services And the hotel employees were so helpful

Reviews.Title: “Not a 5 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: bucklele
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel for business last week. It was fine, the staff were helpful & the room was clean but it was nothing special and certainly doesn't warrent a 5 star rating. The lobby is impressive but generally the hotel is quite shabby & buffet breakfast was average at best (although service was very good). My main complaint was the sound transfer. The noise in the room I was in was very bad & this came from within the hotel, traffic, rooms below, adjacent rooms (I could clearly hear the person in the room next to me going to the toilet....not nice, talking on the phone etc, to the point where I didn't want to even speak in my room as I knew my neighbour would hear me as clearly as I heard him!.) Also, from a business perspective, the wi-fi only worked in the bedrooms (& not in the breakfast room, lobby etc) which was inconvenient. The location was good for me as it was near my companies Istanbul office but was not great for sight seeing. Overall, it was fine, but I think if I'd come on holidays, been paying myself & been expecting a 5 star hotel, I would have been annoyed at this place.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Surmeli !”
Reviews.Author: hosna
Reviews.Content: Me and my husband stayed there on last winter and it was a great experience inspite of freezing weather!! It was my 3rd trip to this beautiful and cultural city, surmeli made it more unforgetable. Staffs were very friendly, breakfast was super specially the variety of breads! :) Taxi station is close to the hotel and you can easily take it, but if you are willing to walk around the hotel you can go to the cevahir shopping mall which is 10-15min walk away. All to all I recommend this hotel to everyone who wants to have memorable stay in this lovely city. Just there is a negative point about this hotel : Sleep bed is very small!!!

Reviews.Title: “Palace of friendship and modernity inside history”
Reviews.Author: PeymanAghtouman
Reviews.Content: I Love Istanbul, The cultural capital from East to West of the world. I prefer to travel to Istanbul twice a year but I choose only Surmelli Hotel. Clean, beautifull and comfortable rooms with interesting views. Excellent management and employees. Real good connections to historical and business places. Delicious and complete breakfasts. Good Rates and fees.

Reviews.Title: “A pleasant place to stay”
Reviews.Author: negin s
Reviews.Content: Istanbul is where you cannot stay indoors for a long time as the city has so many attractions. So if you want to have a plasant place to stay alongside enjoying the wonderful city Surmeli can fulfill your desire. Not to forget its easy approach to main streets and shopping malls. The rooms are clean , the food is fine and the staff are quite friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable rooms”
Reviews.Author: Dotcouple
Reviews.Content: We stayed here at the beginning and end of a two week bus tour. The hotel rooms were clean and comfortable. The staff was helpful. The food was fine.

Reviews.Title: “dissapointing”
Reviews.Author: shonC
Reviews.Content: The Surmeli of the internet site and the one in reality are far far away from each other! This hotel is not even close to five stars facility. It is stuck way back at the seventies. Old building, outdated furnitures and the room was just depressing. old, smelly and unpleasant. However, everything was operating and the total service was quite ok. I would give this hotel 3-4 stars maximum. Overall, not the worst, but when one expects five stars, than it's dissapointing.

Reviews.Title: “Travel to Istanbul - good choice is Surmeli”
Reviews.Author: Serandvic
Reviews.Content: Almost 5 years travelling to Istanbul I have styed at few hotels but have chosen Surmeli. I like hotel service, attentiveness of personnel is very good, service is on high level nice rooms (but some people might feel that rooms are small). Sometimes i faced with internet connection there. Travelling to Istanbul in business trip regurlarly i always chose Surmeli.

Reviews.Title: “we will return for friendly employees”
Reviews.Author: xeenat
Reviews.Content: the pictures of hotel in the websÄ±te is not real cause you cant see bousphor from here.b.ut Ä±nsÄ±de the hotel Ä±s good.Ä±nterent accsess Ä±s good. the variety of breakfast Ä±s good. guest relatÄ±on is perfect Ä±n gÄ±vÄ±ng Ä±nformatÄ±on for sÄ±ghtseeÄ±ng. you dont need tour guid(Ms.ipek gÃ¼neÅŸ).

Reviews.Title: “Definitely not a Five Star hotel, perhaps a four”
Reviews.Author: Yvr101
Reviews.Content: We spent 2 nights at the hotel, after we arrived in our room, we found the safe did not work. Then we had to wait for more than 5 minutes to get into an elevator ( there were 3 big parties in the hotel and there were only 3 elevators working and were overcapacity). Nevertheless, the room was very comfortable, and the front desk and restaurant staff were very friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Great Start to Turkey Tour”
Reviews.Author: ellio62
Reviews.Content: We found the staff very helpful and offered good information to assist us on our stay. We especially appreciated the support from Ipec who went out of her way to assist us when we had issues with a debit card. She ensured our stay went well. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: DPatel20
Reviews.Content: This hotel states its 5 star, but it could pass for 3/4 star. The hotel had no A/Cs on when it was hot outside. The location was good, but a bit noisy though at night. It was close to metro station and one of the shopping malls in Gevahir. The breakfast spread had good choices.

Reviews.Title: “its valid to spend your time in surmeli”
Reviews.Author: ansari_azita
Reviews.Content: special thanks from ipek gunes,she really helped us and gave advise to us about places we can go and enjoy,and what we can do,so our trip were more fun with her advices

Reviews.Title: “do you wanna visit istanbul with price saving ? come on”
Reviews.Author: MEHRAN44
Reviews.Content: Therewas almost every thing i want : breakfast / quiet enviroment / relaxation and specially warm smiles :-) The room was good and very quiet but it need to fix and renew many things ( BATHROOM ) Itis located in a populated partof istanbul but very near to shoppingcenters such as cevahir avm and taksim square . Iwish this hotel to elevate its services specially the sport saloon and pool such as the breakfast combination

Reviews.Title: “A 3 star hotel, with 4 star prices”
Reviews.Author: XdaveX
Reviews.Content: A 3 star hotel, with 4 star prices, claiming to be a 5 star hotel. Most guests seem to be on tour groups so did not choose to stay at this hotel. Rooms are tired and getting tatty with little control over the temperature (either too hot or cold) with cheap sheets and uncomfortable pillows. There is no gym and no water in the swimming pool, a basic uninspiring breakfast designed more to save the hotel money than deliver a satisfactory customer experience. The internet is free, though far from fast or reliable. Bar and minibar prices are exorbitant and the security woman at the door only seems to be checking bags to stop guests bringing their own alcohol into the hotel. All rooms face roads and suffer from noise, even on the upper floors. A very loud piano player and singer in the central atrium disturbs all the rooms during the evening, which is then replaced by the incessant thump of the hotel nightclub which reverberates through the hotel rooms into the early hours. I suggest that if you have a choice, look elsewhere

Reviews.Title: “My opinion for this hotel”
Reviews.Author: Anxhi
Reviews.Content: I was very happy staying on this hotel.The hotel was very good.The location was nice.The hotel staff was very friendly especially the guest relation girl Ipec was very nice.She was working very hard and was doing her job perfectly.She helped us for every problem.she was so kind and friendly.The value of money was ok too.

Reviews.Title: “one of the best hotelssss”
Reviews.Author: nilooofar
Reviews.Content: surmeli is a geart hotel,it has a geart service,kind people work there who respect people and make the hotel as if its your own house. the food is good,for breakfast they give you so many choices so if you are from any country you can find the taste you like. it hase a beautiful veiw wich you can enjoy. the only thing wich they can do better about it is tv channels,if they provide more and various channels it would be much better. and at the end i should say that one of the reason which i recommand you this hotel is because of the great geust relation supervisor who works there,a very kind person,witha great capability to speak english so you can tell her what ever you need and your recommends,

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful service”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Most impressed with the Istanbul hotel chosen by Globus for our Turkish Delight tour. So pleased we added extra nights before and after our tour. Room entirely to our liking, meals excellent with a lovely restaurant which we frequented three times nearby too. Ipek, the Guest Relations Supervisor went out of her way to assist us

Reviews.Title: “The worst ever”
Reviews.Author: BlueME
Reviews.Content: The Surmeli Hotel is the worst hotel ever by far, The stuff don't speak or understand English and not friendlily at all the service is horrible the room is small and old it's too noisy they don't have the basic staff that available in 2 star hotels I will not even give it half star it's really the worst worst hotel ever keep away from it

Reviews.Title: “not really a true 5 star”
Reviews.Author: V_Chhabra
Reviews.Content: overall hotel is nice and has all the facilities of a 5 star which is what it is rated. need to urgently upgrade carpets etc. as they are getting worn out and dirty. some rooms have wooden flooring which is OK, but the ones with the carpets smell somewhat. location is in the business district so not very close to shopping etc. for business stay, it is Ok and economical than several other hotels around in Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Very pleased with this hotel, now we dont check anywhere else in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: olivegem
Reviews.Content: the hotel is technically five star, but it should not be compared to ritz carlton or so in terms of luxury, but it hasnt got that kind of price tag neither. We have stayed in a number of hotels in Istanbul and by far, Surmeli is the winner. Its a simple hotel in terms of amenities, but the staff makes it all. Polite, respectful, but friendly and helpful at the same time. It was one of those places we felt comfortable and at home. The rooms are upgraded now, and was in good order. The price was really good, for the money you give to hilton, you can stay here 3 nights, and probably will receive better service. The location is not the most touristic one, it is more business orientated, but there is a twist, that hotel is located near the last exit to the Bosporus bridge, and near to Mecidiyekoy artery, from you can go to pretty much everywhere in Istanbul. Tube station is walking distance which will take you to taksim square in minutes, the Bosporus is a short taxi ride away, and the guys at the door takes it really seriously when it comes to getting you a cab. Drawbacks, there is no views, overlooking to some council tower blocks looking flats, or other buildings. But we used it only for sleeping and breakfast, so the views weren't a priority. Breakfast was of local style, plenty of choice from open buffet but no bacon or any other pork products, there are salamis though..overall it was a great hotel for the price

Reviews.Title: “satisfactory”
Reviews.Author: TehranMoj
Reviews.Content: the location was good for traveling around the city, easy access to metro station & metro bus . the lobby was not big enough. the staff were rather helpful & warm. there were many iranian and other asian nationalities. the room was convenient enough and the bed was comfortable and very clean. breakfast was acceptable.

Reviews.Title: “Bad location just a 3 star max”
Reviews.Author: CocoLondres
Reviews.Content: We spent 4 days and struggled to get a renovated decent room at the back of the hotel. as it's close to the main highway and wxtremely noisy! Be aware it's very noisy inside as well and housekeepers hover every day around 7am in the hallway in fromt of your rooms.... Roof bar was closed, no map available, poor service!

Reviews.Title: “sauna room rather than hotel room”
Reviews.Author: solitair36
Reviews.Content: I just came back from that disaster trip. I went with my mom and my aunt. I do agree with all the reviews it is 2 star hotel not 5 star. At the first step when I walked to the room I felt the hot and humid weather inside of the room. The temperature was like 30 c. when I asked the manager to fix the problem they told me that is how it is and we cannot do anything, however the temperature of lobby and conference room was very well and pleasurable. Just imagine I had to open the windows during the night to find a way to survive at that hot and humid weather. I had to take shower at least 4 times a day to decrease the temperature of my body. If you want to lose some weight it is the best place to go. The standard of hotel was very low and they are lying about everything. The human factor over there was very low there is no comparison between this hotel and other 5 stars hotels in other places in the world. I just count the days to pass to come back to my home. The behavior of employee was very rude. I do not recommend that hotel for people who have some standard in their life.

Reviews.Title: “very kindly personal”
Reviews.Author: danywatsonuk
Reviews.Content: the hotels food is very delicious and presonal is very kindly. Rooms tidy. you must feel.the second time to visiting istanbul I will stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “The only thing 5 star about this hotel is the room rate.”
Reviews.Author: Sonny47
Reviews.Content: Room design is distastefully minimalist. Amenities are inadequate with only the basic provided. No clock radio or clock, common in 5 star hotels. Only 2 food outlets in the hotel with one open only for breakfast. Food quality is 3 on a scale of 5. English not widely spoken even at the front desk. Hotel is equipped with a very small pool which is closed beginning October, since pool is obviously unheated. Hotel location is not central (seemed to be in a residential area), although admittedly there is a taxi stand across the street from the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Two Star Hotel charging 4 star Rates...”
Reviews.Author: chefcfp
Reviews.Content: I stayed there last week. We booked a room with two beds a month before (I was traveling with a friend). When we checked in we were given a room with one bed but the clerk said nothing. I called when I got upstairs and they reluctantly sent a rollaway after informing me that they were full so I was out of luck. They have a disco on the top floor and my 11th floor room was VIBRATING the music from the bass until almost ONE AM!! They told me it will stop eventually and pretty much called me a whiner. I had an early flight (17 hours) the next day and needed my sleep. One top of that the pillows smelled like sweat and cigarettes. I would stay up all night before I stayed here again.

Reviews.Title: “a fake 5 stars....a 3 stars hotel by international standerds”
Reviews.Author: tommy-moscow
Reviews.Content: i have stayed in this hotel in October 2008 with my friends for 4 days and i have discovered that i was fooled up by their gorgeous website.....this hotel deserve to be a 2-3 stars hotel by international standards.... the rooms furniture was old and definitely needs renovation , the bathrooms was clean but you have to call the room service 3-4 times to get an extra towel or even a shampoo.... !! beside that you take the impression that the working staff are either tired or Board .....!!!!! it has a small tiny outside swimming pool, which was full of tree leaves and not that clean...... they also have a small room for free Internet use, which has 2 computers , and only one of them was working the other one was just a decor.... !!!! not to mention , you have to pay 15 TL every time you wanna get to the nearest attraction area or the old town.... over all , the rooms - for the service provided - was EXTREAMLY OVERPRICED......

Reviews.Title: “not 5 star standard”
Reviews.Author: saeedTehran
Reviews.Content: we stayed for a week at this hotel. on the whole it was ok but not 5 star standard. the drainage in the bathroom kept getting blocked for no apparent reason. the air conditioner was not adequate and the look of the hotel from inside was not very appealing. our room was nice and clean on the 9th floor with a distant view of the Bosphor. Hotel staff were pleasent and breakfast was very good. swimming pool was more like a pond !

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, clean and friendly”
Reviews.Author: rawshan
Reviews.Content: I thought this was a great hotel. Read some reviews and I think people have just been unlucky. Our standard room on the 8th floor was cleaned every day, we used the safe in the room so no problems there. Breakfast was great a huge choice was available and if there was anything you wanted they would cook it up for you. Staff were very helpful, one time my husband needed a pharmacy as he had a mouth ulcer and they went out of their way to help. There is only one downside and that was the location, it if abt 30 mins drive from all the things to see which are all based in sultan ahmet. It cost us about 30YTL every day to get to the main city.

Reviews.Title: “The worst hotel”
Reviews.Author: aseelAmman
Reviews.Content: I have travelled many times and visited many countries and stayed in many hotels but this one was the worst hotel I have ever stayed in. noisy, dirty, untidy rooms in addition to that they are THIEVES , the third day in my stay there they entered my room and stall my purse including my money my credit cards ,I.D's , and all my documents, simply we went there for vacation and instead of enjoying our time we spent our time in police stations and investigations and we could get nothing, except a piece of paper from the police merkizi to help us travel back to our country .it was a horrible time . I strongly advice you NOT to book in this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible - should better be 2 star”
Reviews.Author: jpptraveller
Reviews.Content: How can they refer themselves as 5-star hotel? Where had they dumped their pride as 5-star hotel? - Rude manner of hotel staff ; the reception person did not stop typing on his computer when customer talked to him. Even during replying the inquiry, he never stopped his typing thing. - Lack of hospitality ; It took more than half an hour before they offered changing rooms when we suffered from the loud dance music sound from the upper floor ball room. And NO APOLOGIES!! - Poor facility ; We stayed at 11th floor which is one floor below the ball room. There was a party at the ball room one night and its devastating sound shook our room for hours. The sound inslation is soooo poor that we still could not sleep after we changed the rooms to 8th floor. - Poor amenity ; Where in the world, is the 5-star hotel without any slippers nor a water boiler? What concierge is it without any detail city map? (Its website says they have "city maps" but it's fraud.)

Reviews.Title: “Reminds me of detention!”
Reviews.Author: Kwaja
Reviews.Content: If you were looking for a hotel styled after your 6th grade detention hall, look no further. This hotel, a "Five Star" deserves no more credibility than a [-------] off Indifferent Street. The staff couldn't care less about their guest comfort. The air conditioning wouldn't work and the only response we got the front desk was "Not my problem. What am I supposed to do?" . A perfect holiday ruiner. In fact, the staff was so intolerant that we were forced to check out in the middle of the night and lose 200 euros that the hotel refused to refund. Service in hotels in Turkey have generally been unpleasant but this by far has been the worst service that I have ever experienced and having been traveling the globe for over a decade now, this is something. If you want to feel nostalgic the worst days of your life, try out the Surmeli Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Great place!”
Reviews.Author: renginnn
Reviews.Content: I have been there many times and each time, I had an amazing time. The hotel is comfortable, warm and provides a personalized service.

Reviews.Title: “best hotel ever”
Reviews.Author: sandra12Moscow
Reviews.Content: The location of the hotel was perfect. The food was excellent as well as the other services. The staff was friendly and the room that I stayed in was great.The room was clean and peaceful.. I strongly recommend this hotel to everyone.

HotelInfo.Name: Surmeli Istanbul
HotelInfo.Address: Prof Dr Bulent Tarcan Sokak No 3 | Sisli, Istanbul 34349, Turkey
